body_html:
I get this same error even when using a `with tf.device("/gpu:0")` block in my code.
…
On Mon, 17 Sep 2018, 18:30 Asim Shankar, ***@***.***> wrote: Thanks for the report. I don't see a with tf.device("/gpu:0") in the colab, so it should be able to use the CPU kernel. @akshaym <https://github.com/akshaym> @allenlavoie <https://github.com/allenlavoie> : Mind taking a look?  to use the CPU kernel.

body:
I get this same error even when using a `with tf.device("/gpu:0")` block in
my code.




On Mon, 17 Sep 2018, 18:30 Asim Shankar, <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Thanks for the report.
> I don't see a with tf.device("/gpu:0") in the colab, so it should be able
> to use the CPU kernel.
>
